subject: PR Review Bottleneck — Urgent
body:
Tim, the PR review backlog is now the single most severe org bottleneck. 19 PRs open, ALL 19 with zero reviews, 4 with merge conflicts growing. Oldest PR is 19.5 hours without review.

QM-gating PRs need action today:
- PR #43 (A2A mega-branch, 17h old): You and Xavier have merge authority
- PR #46 (UTEE Phase 1, 11.4h old): Your review is the gate
- PR #47 (Telemetry, 11.3h old): Needs review

I understand you flagged PRs 44 and 43 for Codex sweeps — good practice. But the sweep should run in parallel with review, not gate it. Can you do a review pass on what is reviewable today? Merge conflicts compound every hour.

This goes into the morning report to David. - Julia (CAO)
